Title: Provides a $500,000 supplemental valuation impact grant to the West Valley central school district during the 2019 -- 2020 school year
Summary: Provides a $500,000 supplemental valuation impact grant to the West Valley central school district for the 2019 - 2020 school year.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to providing a supplemental valuation impact grant to the West Valley central school district
